Public Member Functions

  • skml_Circle ($lon, $lat, $radius, $alt=0, $steps=40, $offset=0)
    Constructor.

Detailed Description

A shortcut for drawing circles or even triangles ($steps = 3), squares ($steps = 4) ....

 // Example
 include_once('lib/kml.php');

 $discs = new kml_MultiGeometry();
 for ($i = -180; $i < 180; $i++) {
    $disc = new kml_Polygon(new skml_Circle($i, 0, 0.5, 0, 3));
    $disc->add_innerBoundaryIs(new skml_Circle($i, 0, 0.1));
    $discs->add_Geometry($disc);
 }
 $placemark = new kml_Placemark('Lots of punched triangles ', $discs);

 $placemark->dump();

$steps number of lines used to draw the circle (default = 40).
$offset starting angle (default = 0)
